metadata.description: One of the most unique and powerful minds in rock unleashes one of the strangest and thrilling comics of 2009! His name is Kill Audio, and he is on the road to meet Clockwork, the Keeper of Sight & Sound. And he has one simple question: 'Why can't I die?' From the creator of the best-selling The Amory Wars! Covers by Sheldon Vella and Kristian Donaldson.
metadata.name: Kill Audio
